name: Know Virtue
effect: Epee developed this spell to know, at a glance, the best parts of a person's soul. Everyone has the potential to be charitable or courageous or wise, but one of these traits is generally stronger than the others. If the spell roll succeeds, the character knows the target's Virtue. Successfully using the Aura Perception spell on the target first grants a +3 modifier to the mage.

rotes.roteDescription: This rote is as the spell, above.
